trends: There have been no other sightings in Oakwood
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details My family had just returned form Michigan, I spoke to my mother and went outsidein the back yard with my boyfriend Phil. It was on Sunday evening at about 9:30P.M. We walked to the Dayton Country Club Golf Course and were sitting when wesaw a cylinder-shaped, saucer-shaped object in the sky. It was right below cloudlevel and it was partly cloudy. There were lights on the front and sides, whitesparkling lights. We saw it in the south and it appeared to go north towarddowntown Dayton. Some of the white lights blinked, but it was hard to determinewhich ones. Like it might have been a plane (I first thought) but it wasdifferent than a plane. The lights were not exactly like plane lights. We sawyour (MUFO) UFO article in the newspaper and my booyfrined insisted that I calland report this sighting. We must have watched the object on and off all of twoto three minutes.
